panel.label: Info
panel.name: support_panel
panel.text: For the latest information about Firestorm, visit http://www.firestormviewer.org

panel.label: Créditos
panel.name: credits_panel
panel.text:
Firestorm would not be possible without the decision from Linden Lab to make their Second Life viewer source code available.
O Second Life é trazido a você pela Lindens, com contribuições de código aberto de:
panel.text_editor: Dummy Name substituído durante a execução
